content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: dark_oak_sign
inventory=[{"type": "soul_lantern", "quantity": 60, "index": 10}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "dark_oak_wood", "quantity": 2, "index": 22}, {"type": "honeycomb", "quantity": 61, "index": 24}, {"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 28, "index": 27}, {"type": "note_block", "quantity": 12, "index": 28}]
thought: To craft a dark_oak_sign, I need to craft dark_oak_planks first. To do so, I need to place a dark_oak_wood into the crafting grid. The closest one is in slot 22, so I will move it to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 22 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: dark_oak_sign
inventory=[{"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "dark_oak_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "soul_lantern", "quantity": 60, "index": 10}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "dark_oak_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "honeycomb", "quantity": 61, "index": 24}, {"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 28, "index": 27}, {"type": "note_block", "quantity": 12, "index": 28}]
thought: I have successfully crafted dark_oak_planks. I can now move them to an empty inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: dark_oak_sign
inventory=[{"type": "soul_lantern", "quantity": 60, "index": 10}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "dark_oak_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "honeycomb", "quantity": 61, "index": 24}, {"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 28, "index": 27}, {"type": "note_block", "quantity": 12, "index": 28}]

thought: To craft a dark_oak_sign, I first need to craft dark_oak_planks. The dark_oak_wood at slot 22 can be used to craft dark_oak_planks. Therefore, I will move the dark_oak_wood into the crafting grid (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 22 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: dark_oak_sign
inventory=[{"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "dark_oak_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "soul_lantern", "quantity": 60, "index": 10}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "honeycomb", "quantity": 61, "index": 24}, {"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 28, "index": 27}, {"type": "note_block", "quantity": 12, "index": 28}]
thought: After placing the dark_oak_wood in the crafting grid, I can craft the dark_oak_planks. I will move the resulting dark_oak_planks into an empty inventory slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: dark_oak_sign
inventory=[{"type": "soul_lantern", "quantity": 60, "index": 10}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "honeycomb", "quantity": 61, "index": 24}, {"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 28, "index": 27}, {"type": "note_block", "quantity": 12, "index": 28}]

thought: To craft a dark_oak_sign, I need to place 3 dark_oak_planks horizontally across the top row of the crafting grid, followed by 3 dark_oak_planks horizontally across the middle row of the crafting grid, and finally a stick in the middle of the bottom row of the crafting grid. Therefore, I will start by moving a dark_oak_plank from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: dark_oak_sign
inventory=[{"type": "dark_oak_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "soul_lantern", "quantity": 60, "index": 10}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "honeycomb", "quantity": 61, "index": 24}, {"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 28, "index": 27}, {"type": "note_block", "quantity": 12, "index": 28}]
thought: I have placed one dark_oak_plank in the top left corner of the crafting grid, so I will now place another dark_oak_plank to the right of it.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 2 with quantity 1
